body: Woah nelly.  I didn't realize Lackey was that complacent about it.  :(  I loved her books so much when I was younger, and it gave me hope I could be "saved" or at least become an adult who could save others.   Also, Magic's Pawn got me through middle school and high school as a child because I thought I was like Vanyel but really I'm asexual so whoops.
